list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a wide way leading from one place to another, especially one with a specially prepared surface which vehicles can use.
a series of events or a course of action that will lead to a particular outcome.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he's well on the road to recovery
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đang trên đường phục hồi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (often in place names) another term for roadstead.
